# College Application Portal - Project Instructions

This project is a React-based college application portal with an AI assistant to help students submit and track their applications.

## Features
- Multi-step application form with progress tracking
- Document upload for transcripts/certificates (PDF only)
- AI chatbot component with markdown support
- Video tutorial component with progress tracking
- Dark/Light mode toggle
- Accessibility implementation
- Save draft functionality
- Application preview mode
- Search functionality

## Technology Stack
- React + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Vite for build tooling
- Custom hooks for state management
- Vitest for testing
- React Router for navigation

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components
- Implement responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Follow accessibility best practices
- Use custom hooks for state management
- Write unit tests for core functionality
- Maintain clean component structure

## Project Structure
- `/src/components` - React components
- `/src/hooks` - Custom React hooks
- `/src/types` - TypeScript type definitions
- `/src/utils` - Utility functions
- `/src/pages` - Page components
- `/src/styles` - Global styles

## Getting Started
1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Start development server: `npm run dev`
3. Run tests: `npm run test`
4. Build for production: `npm run build`
